The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria
Farewell to Lórien (The Treason of Isengard)

wikitext.*:
'''Lórien''' can refer to:
==Arda==
* '''[[Irmo]]''', the [[Valar|Vala]] who was also referred to as ''Lórien''.
** The gardens of '''[[Lórien (Valinor)|Lórien]]''' in [[Valinor]], the abode of Irmo.
* The '''Kingdom of [[Lothlórien]]''' in [[Middle-earth]], often referred to as ''Lórien''.
** [[Galadhrim|Elves of Lórien]], the Silvan Elves - or ''Galathrim'' - who lived there.
** [[King of Lórien]], the former title of the rulers of Lothlórien.
** [[Lord and Lady of Lórien]], the titles taken by [[Celeborn]] and [[Galadriel]].

==Books==
* ''[[Farewell to Lórien]]'', eighth chapter of Book II of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* ''[[Farewell to Lórien (The Treason of Isengard)]]'', fourteenth chapter of ''[[The Treason of Isengard]]''.
* ''[[The Story Foreseen from Lórien]]'', the sixteenth chapter of ''The Treason of Isengard''.
==Adaptations==
* ''[[Farewell to Lórien (scene)]]'', a scene from the [[2001]] film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* "Lórien", episode 7 of ''[[Hobitit]]''.
* "Leaves of Lórien", Book VII of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]]''.
==Popular media==
* [[Lórien (British band)]], a British band.
* [[Lórien (Icelandic band)]], an Icelandic band.
* [[Lórien (Italian band)]], an Italian band.
* [[Lórien (Polish band)]], a Polish band.
* [[Lórien (Spanish band)]], a Spanish band.
* [[Lórien (US band)]], a Tennessee indie rock band.
